title: A Wall Is Just A Wall
description: Inspector Denja Kambai known as 'Inspector Danger' by friends and the men of the underworld is kicked out of the police force after a new Divisional Police Officer comes on board. Broke and trying to get his life on track, Denja takes on a job to help a teenager. What was meant to be a simple investigation drags him back into a world he thought he had left behind, as he fights for survival from a past enemy and battles with formidable forces of society's most powerful. How far are they willing to go to stop their secrets from being uncovered?
author: James Ogunjimi
